Articles.Content: Is it possible to remove unwanted RCS ports using the KAS mod?

I don't know if KAS can do it alone, but with KIS there is a wrench or drill your kerbal can equip, when equipped, hold G and left click on the part you want to remove, then you can hold X to reattach it anywhere on the craft

Thanks man, I'm building a modular station around ike, part count was low but I had to add loads of rcs ports to all the separate bits it sent the part count sky rocketing only to be used once!

how do I change this to answered?
